text.language: En covia Yeou p~roc,wmen: Kurie e~le/~con: Kurie e~le/~con: qen oumeym/i...
In the wisdom of God, let us attend. Lord have mercy. Lord have mercy. Truly…
Dalam hikmat Allah, marilah kita perhatikan. Tuhan kasihanilah, Tuhan kasihanilah Sesungguhnya...
أنصتوا بحكمة الله، يارب ارحم، يارب ارحم. بالحقيقة...
